game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A powerful artifact has been hidden in a long-abandoned temple deep within the jungle. The temple is said to be cursed, and many brave adventurers have attempted to retrieve the artifact but never returned.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and the gratitude of the village elder

task.description: The temple is hidden behind a waterfall. You must navigate through the treacherous jungle to find it.
The temple entrance is blocked by a pressure plate. You must solve a puzzle to unlock it.
The artifact is hidden in a treasure chest at the heart of the temple.
